## ColorRGBA64.toStringWebRGB() method

Returns the color formatted as a string; "rgb(0xRR, 0xGG, 0xBB)"

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toStringWebRGB(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

string
